医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
使用拉曼光谱快速鉴定致病细菌BioRisk 的研究探索了利用拉曼光谱快速鉴定铜绿假单胞菌（一种引起严重人类疾病的细菌）的方法，展示了其作为快速有效的诊断工具的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231214/Rapid-identification-of-disease-causing-bacteria-using-Raman-spectroscopy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231214/Rapid-identification-of-disease-causing-bacteria-using-Raman-spectroscopy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1bc5cb96-b9b7-4d15-8a14-0348f3fcc954 Thu, 14 Dec 2023 16:56:00 -0500 Rapid identification of disease-causing bacteria using Raman spectroscopy
常见口服抗凝药利伐沙班与出血并发症风险最高相关当诊断出血栓或心房颤动时，患者通常会服用抗凝剂或血液稀释剂，以防止未来出现血栓。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231214/Common-oral-anticoagulant-rivaroxaban-linked-to-highest-risk-of-bleeding-complications.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231214/Common-oral-anticoagulant-rivaroxaban-linked-to-highest-risk-of-bleeding-complications.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b2374f23-072f-41ac-b7ae-c36c801171a1 Thu, 14 Dec 2023 11:39:32 -0500 Common oral anticoagulant rivaroxaban linked to highest risk of bleeding complications
关于何时使用 N95 的分歧使卫生工作者再次面临风险在超过 3,600 名卫生工作者死于 covid-19 三年后，职业安全专家警告说，如果疾病控制和预防中心采纳其委员会关于医疗机构感染控制指南的建议，那些前线人员可能会再次面临危险，包括医院、疗养院和监狱。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231214/Rift-over-when-to-use-N95s-puts-health-workers-at-risk-again.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231214/Rift-over-when-to-use-N95s-puts-health-workers-at-risk-again.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d6575ee1-db10-4333-9841-399bf9678648 Thu, 14 Dec 2023 07:44:13 -0500 Rift over when to use N95s puts health workers at risk again
吸烟、全因死亡率和过早死亡之间的关系吸烟对该国公共健康产生不利影响，呼吁立即采取行动。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231214/The-relationship- Between-tobacco-smoking-all-cause-mortality-and-premature-death.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231214/The-relationship- Between-tobacco-smoking-all-cause-mortality-and-premature-death.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=584bdf56-7148-4bcd-88d1-87fd8e02369c Thu, 14 Dec 2023 07:05:00 -0500 The relationship between tobacco smoking, all-cause mortality, and premature death
新研究表明，IFNγ 对减少 COVID-19 肺部病毒载量至关重要2 型干扰素 (IFNγ) 在抗病毒免疫中的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231214/IFNceb3-identified-as-crucial-for-reducing-pulmonary-viral-loads-in-COVID-19-new-research-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231214/IFNceb3-identified-as-crucial-for-reducing-pulmonary-viral-loads-in-COVID-19-new-research-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5c3b7a31-caee-4aac-be4c-1491fbfd7c50 Thu, 14 Dec 2023 06:38:00 -0500 IFNγ identified as crucial for reducing pulmonary viral loads in COVID-19, new research shows
优化宫颈癌筛查：新研究评估艾滋病毒阳性女性的最佳方法研究人员评估了坦桑尼亚艾滋病毒感染者各种宫颈癌筛查策略的有效性和结果，支持世界卫生组织 (WHO) 2021 年降低这一高危人群宫颈癌死亡率的指南。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231214/Optimizing-cervical-cancer-screening-New-study-evaluates-best-approaches-for-HIV-positive-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231214/Optimizing-cervical-cancer-screening-New-study-evaluates-best-approaches-for-HIV-positive-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b236eeea-706b-4f25-9232-2a51abfc5be5 Thu, 14 Dec 2023 06:11:00 -0500 Optimizing cervical cancer screening: New study evaluates best approaches for HIV-positive women
新研究强调根据新冠疫情前的数据对先进肺炎球菌疫苗的需求不同肺炎球菌疫苗血清型引起的 CAP 相关危险因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231214/New-study-highlights-the-need-for-advanced-pneumococcal-vaccines-in-the-wake-of-pre-COVID-data.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231214/New-study-highlights-the-need-for-advanced-pneumococcal-vaccines-in-the-wake-of-pre-COVID-data.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=50f96000-5501-41cc-972e-19dc7d911408 Thu, 14 Dec 2023 05:57:00 -0500 New study highlights the need for advanced pneumococcal vaccines in the wake of pre-COVID data
2002年至2019年英格兰314个地区主要癌症死亡率趋势研究人员使用高分辨率时空分析评估了 2002 年至 2019 年英格兰 314 个地区主要癌症的死亡率趋势。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231214/Trends-in-mortality-from-leading-cancers-from-2002-to-2019-for-the-314-districts-in-England.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231214/Trends-in-mortality-from-leading-cancers-from-2002-to-2019-for-the-314-districts-in-England.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d343cb26-95c5-4750-a41a-2438165f8ba9 Thu, 14 Dec 2023 05:41:00 -0500 Trends in mortality from leading cancers from 2002 to 2019 for the 314 districts in England
研究模拟了世卫组织为中低收入国家妇女提出的宫颈癌筛查策略的优点、危害和可负担性人乳头瘤病毒 (HPV) 的七种初级筛查算法的危害、益处和可负担性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231214/Study-models-advantages-harms-and-affordability-of-WHO-profused-cervical-cancer-screening-strategies-for-women-in-LMICs。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231214/Study-models-advantages-harms-and-affordability-of-WHO-profused-cervical-cancer-screening-strategies-for-women-in-LMICs。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=46c6320e-c030-47a4-999d-a5def442fca8 Thu, 14 Dec 2023 05:07:00 -0500 Study models advantages, harms, and affordability of WHO proposed cervical cancer screening strategies for women in LMICs
基因代理 PDE5 抑制与生育力、性行为和健康指标的关联研究人员进行了两个样本的孟德尔随机化分析，以调查 PDE5 的基因代理抑制之间的关联，PDE5 是勃起功能障碍、生育能力、主观健康和性行为的公认药理学目标。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231214/Association-of-genically-proxied-PDE5-inhibition-with-measures-of-fertility- Sex-behavior-and-wellbeing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231214/Association-of-genically-proxied-PDE5-inhibition-with-measures-of-fertility- Sex-behavior-and-wellbeing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0fc4ac0f-1124-428c-a080-e58345f60fc6 Thu, 14 Dec 2023 04:21:00 -0500 Association of genetically proxied PDE5 inhibition with measures of fertility, sexual behavior, and wellbeing
